mapper.select: SELECT userchat_idx, user_id, userchat_subject, userchat_date, userchat_state, current_people, max_people, notice FROM userchat WHERE userchat_state = 1 ORDER BY userchat_date DESC

SELECT userchat_idx, user_id, userchat_subject, userchat_date, userchat_state, current_people, max_people, notice FROM userchat WHERE userchat_subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') AND userchat_state = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userchat(user_id, userchat_subject, current_people) SELECT #{user_id}, #{userchat_subject}, #{current_people} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM userchat WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND userchat_state = 1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE userchat SET userchat_state = 0 WHERE userchat_idx = #{userchat_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT uc.userchat_subject, uc.user_id FROM userchat uc WHERE uc.userchat_idx IN ( SELECT p.chatroom_idx AS userchat_idx FROM parti p WHERE p.user_id = #{user_id} AND p.parti_state = 1 AND p.chatroom_category = 'userchat' )
SELECT current_people FROM userchat WHERE userchat_idx = #{idx}
SELECT localchat_idx, local_category FROM localchat ORDER BY localchat_idx
SELECT * FROM localchat ORDER BY localchat_idx
